title: ListOfItemData
description: Config file for additional item information

Item.description: Unique key to connect the ItemData with other configs

Name.description: Gets the possible names for the item.

Article.description: Gets the grammatical article for the item (e.g. "a" or "the").

Plural.description: Gets the possible plural names for the item.

Multiple.description: Indicates whether the item can be tracked more than once.

CounterMultiplier.description: Gets the number the item counter should be multiplied with, in the case of items that can be tracked more than once.

Stages.description: Gets the stages and their names of a progressive item.

WhenTracked.description: Gets the phrases to respond with when tracking this item, or null to use the generic item responses. The dictionary key represents the current TrackingState

Image.description: Gets or sets the path to the image to be displayed on the tracker.

Hints.description: Gets the possible hints for the item, if any are defined.

PedestalHints.description: Gets the possible hints for the item, if any are defined.

Possibility.description: Represents one possibility of a SchrodingersString.

Weight.description: Gets the weight associated with the item.
